reviews_data.review_text: Great coffee and snacks but the service is pretty rude sometimes. I particularly enjoy the mocha latte

I enjoyed Not Just Coffee quite a lot. They've got good coffee -- and more! Try the Belgian waffle, shown below. It is a nice place to sit and people-watch, and there are some great shops in the area to kill some time as well. There is lots of parking but this area is super busy so you might want to take the light-rail to East-West.
Super cute location. It can be hot sometimes on warmer days. The iced matcha lattes are by far the best thing to get in my opinion especially on a hot day! Also friendly employees :)
Good coffee and food. But not really worth the wait in the long queue. Went on a Saturday morning.
My coworkers and I have been going here for so long. I just wish prices hadn't gone up.
No dogs allowed

Trans and LGBTQIA+ affirming place! Very friendly staff who ask questions for those who don't have a full idea of what they want, or those who forgot to ask what type of milk they want for example. Always willing to have a chat about coffee, life, and makes the shopping center community better. Good coffee, and good food espcially recommend the avocado toast.
Quick service! Great coffee

The best matcha in town!!!! And trust me, I've had matcha at a lot of places in Charlotte. NJC makes it perfectly, full bodied and just delicious. It's watered down at other places. A little pricey and I wish they had larger size cups but still so so good! I get one every morning :) . Atherton is my favorite location too. Friendlier staff and great baristas.
They make their own caramel.

Favorite Not-Just-Coffee location since it's so close to my house! The drinks are a bit pricey especially since I am lactose-intolerant and have to request a non-dairy milk, but the flavor is SPOT ON. Definitely recommend this place.
Love their oat milk lattes and if I'm feeling really fancy, I love adding the vanilla syrup too. DELICIOUS!!! Great vibes, great branding, and GREAT coffee.

They live up to their name, the coffee is some of the best I've found in Charlotte. My wife loves their chai lattes, they also have great breakfast options. I've had the quiche and the breakfast biscuit and both are exceptional.
Great spot to work and eat
Great coffee, just wished they had bigger servings.
coffee should not be allowed to taste this good
One of my favorites in Charlotte
Hot macha and a quiet corner for doing work or chilling out getting out of the house. Friendly staff and quality drinks!
This is the best coffee shop in South End. I would highly recommend. They serve good coffee and more!
One of the best coffee shops in town. Their coffee is strong and tastes great. You don't need extra shot to enjoy the flavor. I also like oatmilk they are using.
Best coffee in Charlotte by far! The Fall latte was incredible with Oat Mylk and the avo toast was worth the drive!

The atmosphere when you walk in is what most coffee shops try to create, NJC makes it an effortless expression of who they are. The drinks are prepared by well trained baristas who understand how to make a cup of coffee correctly. They offer everything from traditional black coffee to fun seasonal inspired drinks. Personally I am a huge fan of their cold brew and their current seasonal latte! The service for both food and beverages is efficient and thoughtful. I am excited to see this brand continue to grow and anxiously await their new house roasted coffee venture with Undercurrent. One of the best places in town for a weekend coffee, a commute pick me up, or a place to sit down and work!
Smoothest, best flavored iced coffee I've found in Charlotte
Great espresso in a very nice location.
It kind of was just coffee 😂
great coffee and staff
Nice little coffee place tucked away in the Southend district.
Delicious coffee, gorgeous space.
Good coffee, good service.
I loved this experience and atmosphere! Great spot with plenty of space, five stars!
Great cold brew
Friendliest barista ever and a perfectly spiced iced chai!
Unique little coffee shop
Delicious drinks, really well done breakfast sandwiches, and rock-solid service. Nice job guys.
Great place...
Very cool interior design. Light streams in like an open roof, but it's enclosed. Cool staff. Oat milk latte was good. Wifi was a bit spotty, but still was able to do my work.
Best coffee in South End. Great location and great space. Accommodating, friendly baristas.  A little pricey for coffee, but overall feels worth it.
Great ☕️, friendly service, one of my favorites. Come on Saturday and enjoy the farmer's market, too!
One of our favorite coffee ☕️ shops in Charlotte — and now also breakfast 🥞/brunch 🍳 places.
There is a woman with blonde hair, thin build,  who works at the counter, who is extremely rude.
They serve Counter Culture coffee. Super delicious cold brew and vanilla latte. Very busy on Saturday morning, as to be expected. Staff was very nice.
Such a mood
Great environment and great drinks. I especially love their oat milk lattes.
Pretentious barista (what a surprise!).. mediocre coffee
Horrible service but the avocado toast is good. The employees were very rude and inconsiderate. They made unnecessary remarks about my order.

Ambient space with the open ceiling light. A few shops in and around the Atherton Mill. Although it is difficult to find because of no signage from the main roads. Only until your close to the building with you see any. Friendly staff and know how to properly serve beverages. Wifi is available and places to plug-in a laptop to get work done of vibe with a group
Loved this location

Staff is nice and the product is good. The music is so loud I can hear it over my earbuds though. Not a good place to grad a coffee and study. If i could listen to stuff on my earbuds at least it would be ok. That is impossible here due to the level of the ambiant music. Good place to bring children though
Nice place with nice decor and natural light. I have no idea how the coffee tastes exactly the same in all of there locations! Must Visit.
Visiting the area and the perfect place for morning stop! The matcha was amazing and I highly recommend the toast with almond butter. Staff was friendly and location convenient.
Coffee was good Vibes were good Great place for a little coffee date
Very impressive caring place with great coffee, lattes, and cappuccinos .    Lots of seating.
My favorite place to drink coffee and buy coffee beans.

Went in on a Friday afternoon. I walked up to the counter, barista barely glanced up from espresso machine, no greeting or 'I'll be right with you.' Stood there for 2 minutes until someone else came up to take my order. They weren't busy at all, I was one of two customers in the entire place. There are plenty of other local coffee shops that have nicer attitudes than this place did. My cold brew was good though 👍

This is what my straw looked like before I finished my drink. Paper straws are not suitable substitute. There are great biodegradable ones but paper does not make a good straw. As a coffee place, you have one job. A drinkable drink. Quit it with the garbage straws.
Very good coffee for reasonable prices.
Little & cute place in pretty south end. The matcha tea with almond milk is just delicious!
Just a lovely place, located in a quiet atrium at Atherton. The staff here are all wonderful; they treat everyone with respect, and I always feel at home.
Service was great - so was the Chai.

Friendly staff and good coffee. Made a food error, but were extremely prompt accommodating about it. The best BLT I have ever had (house-cured bacon and sun dried tomato aoili- WOW). Our children will hear about this BLT.
Best coffee in CLT
Great coffee.

Great space insider Atherton Mill with even better coffee. My pour over was prepared perfectly, priced reasonably (especially given the rarity of the beans I chose) and tasted fantastic. Highly recommend.
Great coffee, fast and friendly service. Clean tables. Will come back. Highly recommend.
Overpriced small coffees in a hallway. Not what I expected.

Great little coffee shop. They also have live Jazz at the Atherton Mill location on the last Thursday of each month. You can grab some wine from the wine bar Vin Master in same building. Lots of places to plug in and work.
Pretty cool little place, decent coffee, kinda pricey but it was a neat place to visit
Best coffee I've ever had by far.
I love this spot. It's in a great area. Great vibe and awesome coffee.
Love ❤️
Beautiful location and great coffee! The yogurt parfaits are my favorite!
Awesome place to hangout with.

Good coffee and a cookie (although it upset my stomach for some reason. Couldn't finish either). The WiFi is terrible and very little Verizon service there either. There are definitely better places to go to work but this is a good stop for coffee.

We are recent Charlotteans, having lived here only a few short weeks. We moved from Brooklyn and it's Brooklyn coffee we want daily in our lives! And we finally found it here in Charlotte. We had the best experience at Not Just Coffee at Atherton Mill.  The vibe was relaxed and chic, the coffee was divine, and if you want something for your sweet tooth they have great baked items too. We had a cherry "pop-tart" and it was such a treat. Lastly, the staff was great, great service and excellent skill at making the perfect cup. Cant wait to return!
The caramel latte is life changing.
Best coffee I've had yet
Those Los Angeles vibes
Great staff, coffee and atmosphere. Nothing super special though to give it 5 stars though.
Very slow 20 minutes for a cappuccino....I love coffee....but not this much.

I appreciate a place that has a cortado on the menu and multiple alt. milk options (almond and oat!), but the coffee was not good. The beans were burnt, so the acidity was off the charts, a weirdly unpleasant cup to drink. Space is gorgeous with lots of great long tables to work at in the back and smaller round tables in the front to sit and chat. Maybe order something other than coffee?
One of the few speciality coffee shops in Charlotte. Located in a beautiful brick metchantile building. I did find it strange they only offer paper cups both from an experience and waste standpoint.
Great for tea and a date

Great coffee/Chai at a great price at Atherton Mills. I've enjoyed their drinks on several occasions and the quality is equal to Starbucks... but their prices are almost half the cost. So enjoy some great cafe treats in a cool hipster environment, in an interesting and eclectic mall -- with no minor guilt or irritation at having your wallet picked.
Best atmosphere in town for coffee.  5 star service and baristas have top level coffee knowledge.
A nice place to hangout. They also have a good selection of coffees.
Best coffee in the south
Great service and coffee.  I would go every day if I lived closer.
This place was amazing! Great atmosphere! Very welcoming and a great staff! Cortado was one of the best I've ever had. Definitely stopping by anytime I'm in the area!
Great. Fast service. My breve latte was delicious.
Warm, friendly staff, excellent coffee and a huge seating space great for reading or casual meetings. You can also bring your dog to this space which is cool.
Our daddy daughter stop every Saturday.
Coffee was merely OK for a place trying to look like it's a hard-core serious coffee joint. The place is a bit up itself. You can do better.
Super tasty coffee! Really friendly service. Would go back!
Great coffe and pastry. Also, amazing location! You can visit artisan market on Saturday to get fresh produce and a local spice store!

My husband and I have visited over 75% of the local coffee shops in Charlotte, Huntersville, and surrounding areas. Not Just Coffee is our favorite hands down. The drinks are made from organic coffee, the milk is locally produced and is not as processed as your average commercial milk, and they have other great non-dairy options also. The iced caramel latte is to die for. They make their own caramel.  The atmosphere in the shop is amazing, with live plants and open sky lights. Plenty of room for seating and the barista are always such nice and patient people. I can't recommend Not Just Coffee, especially this location enough.
The aesthetic of this place is unreal.
Just a cool coffee shop
The perfect coffee experience.

Great Staff, Owner, and coffee. They serve Counter Culture Coffee (this is the roaster not some hip trendy name for fancy coffee) and quality espresso drinks. They offer several types of Chai Tea and a great selection of pastry/baked goods.
Extremely good coffee and a nice, open, well lit atmosphere!
Great atmosphere.   Wknderful staff and the coffee is exceptional.
Best coffee in town
Megan is great! Coffee is superb! Atmosphere awesome!
I love this location, as the natural lighting and all the plants everywhere make me HAPPY!  The staff, and quality of ingredients is amazing. Not Just Coffee is the ONLY place to be.
Gorgeous natural light, peaceful morning space, unpretentious third wave coffee from kind, calm baristas. Located behind Free People & Anthropologie. Parking could be challenging.

After vacationing in Kauai for two weeks and being disappointed by every coffee place we tried, we couldn't wait to get back to Charlotte to enjoy great coffee at Not Just Coffee! Carmel latte is amazing.
Great coffee and great convo. Love the naturally lit environment and the easy bustle of the venue.
Nice studio kinda place behind living kitchen. This place is good for great iced coffee amd hot chocolate. Hardly anything to much on though! No complaints about that 😃
Holy Mole! Unique and delicious - not to be missed.
While I am partial to Hex as my favorite Charlotte coffee, Not Just Coffee is a close second.  The location is really cool as well.

This is a treasure for the Queen City. There is something about great coffee in this town and Not Just Coffee nails it every single time. Their staff are knowledgeable, helpful courteous and affable. This location, albeit slightly hidden in the building (depending on which way you enter) is a nice bright space, and although not massive, doesn't feel cramped.
The place is small and usually full, but worth it. Great coffee, saw a lot of food come out that looked great, friendly staff...oh and booze. A good choice of booze.
Really friendly staff.
My new favorite coffee destination - convenient Atherton Mills location, attractive & comfortable space, friendly service, great coffee, and amazing homemade pop tarts!
My favorite coffee spot! The staff is all very friendly and most of them even know my order by heart.
Great vibe, amazing coffee, overall awesome place to work or hang out with friends!
The most impressive coffee in CLT. Simple, balanced, perfectly measured, poured, etc. True masters of their craft.
Ginger Chai is so good. Beautiful space.

Located in Atherton Mill, inside the market by the tracks and across from Luna's.  I had a meeting here and found it to be a lovely spot to meet for an afternoon coffee and conversation.  I went early to work a little bit.  They have family style tables inside and seating outside.  I adore the coffee & opted for the cold pressed brew...my favorite on a hot day.  When you don't want to find parking Uptown, this is close enough and fairly easy parking.  Get the cold press, you won't regret it!
Looks like the place closed. Place was closed this morning and no coffee machines visible.
This is the best place to come for good quality coffee. Also it has a clean and natural look with the best latte art in Charlotte.

Honestly, it's probably the best coffee in the Charlotte area. It's a fairly new place, started in 2011, but the people that work there always know what they are doing and have a passion for it. Would highly recommend to any coffee lovers that live in the Charlotte area or just passing theiugh.
Drive to this area just for this coffee! Love this coffee, great tea too!!
Our favorite coffee in Charlotte!
Such an amazing place with amazing coffee. Did I mention how much I love this place and the great people!!! Both of their locations are AWESOME! I would highly recommend any of their pour overs!
